title: Add inline booking/contact form to Strategy Call CTA

requirements.summary: Replace the 'Book a Free 15-Min Strategy Call' button in the BottomCTA section with an inline contact/booking form
acceptanceCriteria: The BottomCTA section displays an inline form instead of (or below) the CTA button
Form fields: Full Name, Email Address, Business Name, and a 'What do you want to automate?' textarea
Submit button is labeled 'Book My Free Strategy Call' and uses the teal accent styling
On successful submission, a confirmation message is shown (e.g., 'Thanks! We'll be in touch within 24 hours.')
Form validates that Name and Email fields are non-empty before submission
Form visually matches the dark theme with teal accent colors and Inter typography
Form is responsive and displays correctly on mobile and desktop

file_operations.description: Replace the 'Book a Free 15-Min Strategy Call' button with an inline contact form. Add state for form fields (name, email, businessName, message), validation state, and submission state. Render input fields for Full Name, Email Address, Business Name, and a textarea for 'What do you want to automate?'. Style the form using the existing dark theme with teal accent colors matching the current button. Include client-side validation for required name and email fields. Ensure the form is responsive and works on mobile and desktop layouts.

requirements.summary: Wire the frontend contact form to call the backend submitContactForm canister method and display success or error messages
acceptanceCriteria: Form submission calls the backend submitContactForm method using the actor from useActor
A loading/spinner state is shown on the submit button while the call is in-flight
On success, the form is replaced or cleared and a confirmation message is shown
On error, an inline error message is displayed without clearing the form fields
The 'Book a Call' button in the Navigation bar smooth-scrolls to the BottomCTA form section

file_operations.description: Import the useActor hook from frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts. Add submission handler that calls actor.submitContactForm(name, email, businessName, message). Implement loading state that disables the submit button and shows a spinner during the canister call. On successful submission, clear the form fields and display a confirmation message: 'Thanks! We'll be in touch within 24 hours.' On error, display an inline error message prompting retry without clearing form fields. Add an id attribute to the BottomCTA section wrapper for scroll targeting.
Update the 'Book a Call' button's smooth-scroll target to match the id added to the BottomCTA section wrapper, ensuring the navigation button scrolls directly to the new inline form.
